abstract: Robert Thomson will run the separate, publicly traded company, which will include The Wall Street Journal, The New York Post, HarperCollins and a suite of lucrative television assets in Australia.
snippet: Robert Thomson will run the separate, publicly traded company, which will include The Wall Street Journal, The New York Post, HarperCollins and a suite of lucrative television assets in Australia.

headline.main: News Corp. Picks a Chief for a Spinoff
